title: Unforgettable: My 10 Best Flights
description: Flying magazine editor Lane Wallace has flown plenty of unique flights, from the Swiss Alps to Key West, from a Piper Cub to a U-2 spy plane. In this new book, she recounts her 10 best, and in the process, reminds all pilots why we fly. Written with Lane's trademark style and sense of wonder about the world she experiences and explores, and filled with insight about the emotions and life lessons flying evokes, it's ideal for both pilots and non-pilots. Includes 8 pages of color pictures. If you like Lane's column, you'll love Unforgettable.
author: Lane Wallace
